text: So Avengers: Doomsday is shaping up to be another Infinity War? I'm not even mad. I'm hoping it brings back the excitement and Marvel magic that's been missing from the more recent movies. https://t.co/rfqm2CLNL5
It's crazy how high the hopes were at the start of the season 😢 https://t.co/j4e6vVcwz3
#WhiteLotus season one is a show about nothing, leading up to an accident. It was enjoyable, but also kind of unsatisfying.
RT @brucelee: "What I honestly value more than anything else is quality; doing one’s best in the manner of the responsibility and craftsman…
